about_the_game:
The Volvo Construction Equipment DLC includes 5 different branded construction machinery from Volvo CE's line-up for drivers to haul and deliver across the USA.

Volvo Construction Equipment is among the world’s leading manufacturers of articulated haulers and wheel loaders, and one of the world’s foremost manufacturers of excavation equipment, road development machines and compact construction equipment. With over 180 years in the business, Volvo CE continues to lead in their field and in technology and safety.

This DLC includes:

A25G (Articulated Hauler)


The Volvo A25G is a medium sized articulated Dump Truck, weighing in at over 22 tons and measuring at over 3.3m (11ft) in height and 10m (33ft) in length! This machine is most commonly used in agriculture, mining, construction and highway maintenance.

SD160B (Soil Compactor)


The SD160B is a Soil Compactor which weighs 16 tons and measuring 3m (10ft) in height and 6m (20ft) in length! This machine is perfect for working on foundations, buildings, pavements, and other structures.

EC220E (Crawler Excavator)


The EC220E Crawler Excavator is the ultimate digging tool. Weighing 25 tons, 3m (10ft) in height and 9.7m (32ft) in length, it is used in mining, road building, civil engineering, general construction and more!

EW240E Material Handler (Excavator)


The EW240E Material Handler is made for all jobs large and small! At over 9.4m (31ft) in height and weighing 28 tons, it is the ultimate machine for the job at hand.

L250H (Wheel Loader)


The L250H Wheel Loader is a heavy-duty machine weighing 34 tons, 3.6m (12ft) in height and 7.3m (24ft) in length! It is perfect machine to dig, move, load and more at any job site.

Rock Bucket Volvo SPN P T SEG

Wheels with Volvo Rims

Volvo Construction Equipment is among the world’s leading manufacturers of articulated haulers and wheel loaders, and one of the world’s foremost manufacturers of excavation equipment, road development machines and compact construction equipment. This DLC includes:

The Volvo A25G is a medium sized articulated Dump Truck, weighing in at over 22 tons and measuring at over 3.3m (11ft) in height and 10m (33ft) in length! This machine is most commonly used in agriculture, mining, construction and highway maintenance.

SD160B (Soil Compactor)


The SD160B is a Soil Compactor which weighs 16 tons and measuring 3m (10ft) in height and 6m (20ft) in length! This machine is perfect for working on foundations, buildings, pavements, and other structures.

L250H (Wheel Loader)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
